title: Major service disruption on North-South Line

updates.text: [NSL] CLEARED: Train services between Kranji and Woodlands are now running normally.Free regular bus & shuttle bus services have ceased.
[NSL]Fault cleared but some trains & stations are still crowded due to congestion.
[NSL]CLEARED: Free public & shuttle buses are still available at affected stations between #ChoaChuKang and #Woodlands station.
[NSL]UPDATE: Free public & shuttle buses are now available at affected stations between #ChoaChuKang and #Woodlands station.
[NSL] UPDATE: Due to traction power fault, there is no train service from Kranji to Woodlands station towards MarinaBay.
[NSL]: No train service from #Kranji to #Woodlands towards MarinaBay. Please seek alternative transport.
